categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Oorallon was a male Jedi Master that served the Jedi Order as a Seer during the Republic Era. As Oorallon was a member of a gaseous species who had to reside in a tank, Dooku compared the Plinovians to him. Despite his negative feelings towards Seers, Dooku often allowed his Padawan Qui-Gon Jinn to work with Oorallon.
Oorallon was first mentioned in the 2019 audiobook Dooku: Jedi Lost, written by Cavan Scott. The spelling of Oorallon's name was given in the script of the audiobook.
